name: Creatures of Emeralds (2017)
description:
Dev Note: This is a game I first started making in college and finished after the death of one of my friends. I haven't touched up on this since 2017 and am not likely to update it as I no longer have access to the original drafts in unity as well as the game bringing me too many painful memories. I figured I'd keep it here as an alternative to MEGA in the off chance I forget to update that storage. I'll have it published here should anyone be curious. I hope it can offer inspiration through the visual aesthetics of the game.  Any bugs, mistakes, or outdated notes discovered through play will remain as is for the reasons previously stated.

Summary: You play as an explorer making first contact with an alien force who grant you the ability to explore sections of their world, then they grant you a "choice" to determine the fate of humanity.
